jobDescription: Senior Business Data Analyst On behalf of our client, Procom Services is currently looking for a Senior Business Data Analyst on a 5 month contract in the Jersey City, NJ area Senior Business Data Analyst Main DutiesSupport plan around Integration projects.Create a communication plan around projects to ensure stakeholders have complete transparency around deliverablesPerform Data analysis to confirm data coverage based on client requirementsIndependently query data from multiple relational databases for analysisWork closely with IT and Operations partners to identify area which require monitoring and create business as usual (BAU) processes to satisfy the requirementCreate Specifications for Reports that are required by Operational staff to manage data.Provide support for Integrations and client migrations for platforms.Engineer repeatable processes for integrations.Monitor securities data platforms to identify exceptionsRemediate exceptions by writing procedures for Operations to remediate various scenarios.Engineer repeatable operational processes which can be used to ensure data qualityWork with technology teams over the weekend to perform releases.Senior Business Data Analyst Must HavesDemonstrated ability to manage complex projects involving multiple technology and business stakeholder teamsDemonstrated experience in Project Management and Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), including Waterfall and Agile methodologies.Strong analytical skills and writing skills, to include solid experience in writing functional and technical specifications, including system and data flows, solution proposals, implementation roadmaps.Experience/understanding of business process reengineering and business modeling concepts, business systems development and analysisMust possess good communication skills with the ability to be assertiveStrong teamwork skills in a small local setting, as well as across different geographic locationsAbility to focus on high quality work while under pressureProficiency writing SQL queries is required.Advanced knowledge of MS Office, Visio and PSQLSenior Business Data Analyst Assignment Length 5 Month Contract Senior Business Data Analyst Start Date ASAP
